item.title: Strokes Gained Now A Major Part of Disc Golf
item.description: Stroked Gained has been an important feature in Ball Golf since at least 2011. Now Stroked Gained has come to Disc Golf, thanks to the amazing numberfiles over at UDisc. For those who don’t yet know, here is a great introduction to Stroked Gained from the Disc Golf perspective. “The public is more familiar with bad design than good design. It is, in effect, conditioned to prefer bad design, because that is what it lives with.
